'''Katsuyu: Immense Network Healing''' is a cooperation ninjutsu used by Katsuyu and its summoner using the link shared via the [[Strength of a Hundred Seal]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 635, page 4</ref>

== Usage ==
Firstly, Katsuyu [[Slug Great Division|divides]] its body into several smaller clones, and then each attaches itself to a person. The slug's summoner then channels their [[Mystical Palm Technique|medical chakra]] through Katsuyu, who in turn [[Chakra Transfer Technique|transfers]] it to the wounded person, healing their wounds, restoring their stamina and chakra reserves.<ref name="d4"/>

This technique allows the user to heal a great number of people simultaneously regardless of distance. While using this technique, the user is linked with Katsuyu, allowing them to communicate with the slug and sense what it encountered on the battlefield.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 427, pages 6-7</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 427, page 9</ref>
